title: [Large-Scale] Language Practical Competency Enhancement Program Through Online Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Practical Work Experience
context.additional_context: A program improving language practical skills for current practitioners through project-based collaborative learning. Learners access online collaboration tools and LMS using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can apply effective collaborative communication strategies in online environments through E-tivities
Learners can complete project deliverables that reflect social, cognitive, and teaching presences of the Community of Inquiry (CoI) model
Learners can form collaborative learning communities to solve practical language tasks using digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
